data.name: The Exclusion Zone Online
data.detailed_description:
MMO Online first-person shooter, with RPG and survival elements.
Events unfold in our days, in a closed, infected territory, which is not so easy to find on a normal map. The usual laws do not apply here, there are no police and law enforcement agencies - so the zone attracts people who want to avoid justice. And various anomalies and their creations attract scientists, mercenaries, hungry for profit, and ordinary stalkers.
At the very beginning, players are asked to choose a character (with their own history and reasons for staying in the closed zone) and distribute the starting characteristics.
The game has no restrictions on leveling up your character. Players decide who they want to become: a technician, a medic, a soldier, a merchant, or develop in a versatile way. In parallel with the experience set, the character will receive achievements that give additional bonuses to health, strength, endurance, intelligence, and others. Players can join groups and capture territories that will bring them a tactical advantage and financial profit. The money received from the captured territories can be spent on improving bases and fortifications, hiring NPCs to defend the captured territories, and so on.
There are also various ratings in the game. Those who enter the top receive bonuses and rare items.

data.supported_languages:
English, Russian*, Spanish - Spain
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel core i5-6600k
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel core i7-4770k
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1080
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSDm2

content_descriptors.notes: The game features shooting, blood, killing, and various injuries.
